summary: This document is an email correspondence from Vahe Stepanian to Amanda Kirby regarding an incoming cash alert related to a deposit received for an account. The email indicates a significant amount exceeding $1,000 and is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is identified as an associate in wealth investment coverage at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and is the sender of the email.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the email from Vahe Stepanian regarding the cash alert.

connections.description: Vahe Stepanian is an associate at Deutsche Bank, and Amanda Kirby is a recipient of his email, indicating a professional relationship.

events.title: Incoming Cash Alert
events.description: A deposit of $8,188.19 was received for an account, exceeding $1,000.

locations: 345 Park Avenue - 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Vahe Stepanian is associated with Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. in wealth investment coverage.
An incoming cash alert was issued for a deposit of $8,188.19.
The amount of the deposit exceeds $1,000.
The email correspondence is marked as confidential.
